definition: Hosni Mubarak (1928-), former Egyptian President and military commander
surname Mu
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
variant of 剋|克[ke4]
to scold/to beat

sentences.english: Mubarak tolerates no challenges to his martial-law rule.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克不容任何对他军事统治的挑战。

sentences.english: And a clutch of counter-terrorism laws that were widely abused under Mr Mubarak will be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 一些在穆巴拉克执政期间广泛滥用的反恐法也将废除。

sentences.english: Mubarak poster hangs above the souq in Aswan.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的画像悬挂在当地的集市上。

sentences.english: Then military helicopters will be sent to Cairo, Mubarak Police Academy for trial.
sentences.chinese: 随后军用直升机将把穆巴拉克送至开罗警官学院受审。

sentences.english: "Get down, get down, " the anti-Mubarak crowd chanted at him.
sentences.chinese: “趴下，趴下，”反穆巴拉克人群中高呼他。

sentences.english: Anti-government protesters have reacted angrily to Mr Mubarak's address.
sentences.chinese: 反政府示威者愤怒地作出了反应穆巴拉克先生的地址。

sentences.english: Mr Mubarak's sons Gamal and Alaa have been summoned for questioning as well.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的儿子盖莫尔和阿拉也受到了传唤。

sentences.english: The regime is using the media focus on the Hosni Mubarak trial to finish off Hama," one resident told Reuters by satellite phone from the city.
sentences.chinese: 当局正利用媒体对审判穆巴拉克的关注摧毁哈马市。

sentences.english: An Egyptian court has ordered the dissolution of the political party of the former President Hosni Mubarak.
sentences.chinese: 埃及一个法庭已经下令解散前总统穆巴拉克的政党。

sentences.english: Luckily for the military, its moment as Mubarak's domestic enforcer may soon be ending.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克政权的即将终结对于军队是一个好消息。

sentences.english: Mubarak hands over power to VP without stepping down.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克向副总统部分交权拒绝辞职。

sentences.english: "I was working with Magdy before the revolution but I waited until Mubarak resigned to sell it. It was entirely serendipitous, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 革命前我为Magdy工作，直到穆巴拉克把它卖掉。

sentences.english: Mr. Mubarak's visit to the Oval Office marks an improvement in U.S.-Egyptian relations.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的访美标志着美国和埃及关系的改善。

sentences.english: Many Egyptians scornfully call Mr. Mubarak “the Pharaoh.”
sentences.chinese: 许多埃及人把穆巴拉克戏称为“暴君法老王”。

sentences.english: Egypt's largest newspaper The Independent reported that Mubarak has been in a coma.
sentences.chinese: 埃及最大独立报消息称，穆巴拉克已陷入昏迷状态。

sentences.english: This holiday was created by Mubarak only in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 这个节日是穆巴拉克在2009年新创建的。

definition: Morales
Ramadan (loanword)
Ahmed (name)
Hernández (name)
Morsi, Mursi or Morsy (name)/Mohamed Morsi (1951-), Egyptian Muslim Brotherhood politician, president of Egypt 2012-2013
King Fahd of Saudi Arabia
Abdullah (name)
Nasr or Nasser (Arab name)/Gamal Abdel Nasser (1918-1970), Egyptian President
Anwar Al Sadat
Chavez, Spanish name
Barack, Barak, Ballack (name)
Zuma (name)/Jacob Zuma (1942-), South African ANC politician, vice-president 1999-2005, president 2009-2018
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Sadiq or Sadik (name)
Maliki or Al-Maliki (name)/Nouri Kamel al-Maliki (1950-) prime minister of Iraq from 2006
